dict.acceptation: 密封；盖章；决定；封上（信封）；

sent.orig: The revolutionary NIB-SEAL bronze ball valve stops condensate, cold.
sent.trans: 具有创新功能的NIB-SEAL青铜球阀能够防止冷凝和冷却。

sent.orig: NIB-SEAL on sweat ball valves are shipped unassembled.
sent.trans: 在焊接球阀上，NIB-SEAL在装运时处于未组装状态。

sent.orig: Shaft seal: it can use mechanical seal, dynamic seal and packing seal, at theoption of users.
sent.trans: 轴封：采用机械密封、动力密封及填料密封，用户可以任意选定。

sent.orig: Generally use the soft rubber type sealing ring seal, hard seal ring-type metal seal used.
sent.trans: 软密封型一般采用橡胶环密封，硬密封型通常采用金属环密封。

sent.orig: The article mainly introduces seal principium and the relation of seal invalidation and seal gap.
sent.trans: 简述了密封原理和密封失效与密封间隙的关系。
